# Q010 Area Calculation
^question Q010
^type text_entry_numeric
^identifier TEN_Q001
^title Area Calculation
^points 2
^labels #Math #Geometry #Apply #Medium

@field: question_text
Calculate the area of a rectangle with length 7 cm and width 6 cm.

Area = {{blank_1}} cm²
@end_field

@field: blanks

@@field: blank_1
^Correct_Answers
- 42
- 42.0
^Tolerance 0.1
^Input_type numeric
@@end_field

@end_field

@field: scoring
^Points_per_correct_field 2
^Points_minimum 0
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
Area = length × width = 7 × 6 = 42 cm²
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback
Correct! 42 cm²
@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback
Incorrect. Multiply length by width.
@@end_field

@@field: partial_feedback
Partially correct.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please enter a numeric answer.
@@end_field

@end_field
